definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: king (genera1 Sem.; v. BH);—´[[מ]]: abs. Da 2:10 + 2 t.; cstr. Da 4:34 + 6 t.; usu. emph. [[מַלְכָּא]] Ezr 4:8 + 154 t., [[ה]]—[[ָ]] Da 2:11; pl. [[מַלְכִין]] Ezr 4:15 + 9 t., [[ים]]—[[ִ]] Ezr 4:13 (Hebraism, Be-Ry M:41*); emph. [[מַלְכַיׇּא]] Da 2:44 + 2 t.;—king Da 2:4, Da 2:5 + 132 t. Dn, Ezr 4:8, Ezr 4:11 + 42 t. Ezr ([[מֶלָךְ מַלְכַיׇּא]] of Neb. Da 2:37, of Artax. Ezr 7:12 [cf. Cooke:71.3, of Xerxes]; [[מַלְכִין]] Da 7:17 = kingdoms, cf. [[מַלְכוּ]] v:Da 7:23).
